description: Provides tooling to manage error free RFC compliant best practice CAA policy records for a domain, subdomain or specific hostname.
variableDescription: %host%: name for the CAA record, may be '@' for the domain apex, or a subdomain; %flags%: flags for the CAA record, typically 0, or 128 to indicate critical; %property%: property for the CAA record; %params%: property parameters, e.g. CA domain identifier and any additional parameters, or IODEF reporting URL;
